item.description:
Our ethnic dining will move to Sunday night and we will try Priya in Rocky Hill, which has a great reputation.

Sunday Night Tiffin Buffet $11.99 from 5:00pm - 10:00pm
Includes all types of Dosas and Uthappams served fresh to the table
- Dosa types: Masala Dosa, Mysore Masala Dosa, Onion Dosa, Onion Rava Masala Dosa, Set Dosa, Pesarattu, Cheese Dosa.
- Uthappam types: Onion Chilli Uthappam, Vegetable Uthappam, Paneer Uthappam, Pineapple Uthappam
- Other buffet items may include Idli, Pakora, Upma, Vegetable Biriyani, Paratha with Kurma, Curd rice and Desse

Wow! For $11.99, sure beats brunch at some of those fancy places!
item.name: Ethnic dining goes Indian
